nodes.feature: Number of concurrent jobs for a private project
nodes.pipelines: only one job, not support concurrent (Microsoft hosted, private repo, free option) https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/licensing/concurrent-jobs?view=azure-devops&tabs=ms-hosted#how-much-do-parallel-jobs-cost

nodes.actions: 6 hours for each job and 72 hours for each workflow

nodes.feature: Total build time for a month (private repo)

nodes.actions: Support container based action so you can use any languages. https://docs.github.com/en/actions/creating-actions/creating-a-docker-container-action
nodes.feature: Supported languages for creating an extension

nodes.actions: Built-in code scanning and can integrate with 3rd party security gates
nodes.pipelines: Only integrate with 3rd party security gates
